6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prayed Zuhr and 'Asr together, and Maghrib and 'Isha' together, when there was no fear and he was not traveling

chapter.ara-name: باب الْجَمْعِ بَيْنَ الصَّلاَتَيْنِ فِي الْحَضَرِ
chapter.eng-name: Combining Two Prayers While A Resident
